text:
Nicholas Diego Leanos (born September 6, 1996) known by his stage name Lil Xan, is an American rapper and songwriter.
Biography.
Lil Xan was born in 1996 in Redlands, California. He dropped out of school when he was in 9th grade.
Career.
Lil Xan mainly became popular after he released the song "Betrayed" in 2017. Then in 2018 he released his first album, "Total Xanarchy". In January 2020 he announced his sophomore album "Sorry I Didn't Quit".
